description.zh-cn: 1856年至1860年间，大英帝国与法兰西第二帝国联合发动的侵华战争，被认为是第一次鸦片战争的延续。
description.en: A war from 1856 to 1860, waged by the British Empire and the Second French Empire against the Qing dynasty of China. It is considered a continuation of the First Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个封建王朝，第二次鸦片战争中的一方。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, a combatant in the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次鸦片战争的发动国之一。
description.en: One of the aggressor nations in the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次鸦片战争的发动国之一。
description.en: One of the aggressor nations in the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 英国与法国在第二次鸦片战争期间组成的联合远征军。
description.en: The joint expeditionary force formed by Britain and France during the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 英国发动第二次鸦片战争的借口。
description.en: The casus belli for the British Empire to launch the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 法国参与第二次鸦片战争的借口。
description.en: The casus belli for the Second French Empire to participate in the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第九位皇帝，第二次鸦片战争期间的在位君主。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Qing dynasty, reigning during the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 清末重要将领，在第二次鸦片战争中指挥清军作战。
description.en: An important general in the late Qing dynasty who commanded Qing forces during the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，时任两广总督，在战争初期被英法联军俘虏。
description.en: A Qing official serving as the Viceroy of Liangguang, who was captured by the Anglo-French forces early in the war.

nodes.id: 詹姆斯·布鲁斯，第八代额尔金伯爵

zh-cn: 詹姆斯·布鲁斯，第八代额尔金伯爵
额尔金伯爵詹姆斯·布鲁斯

description.zh-cn: 英国殖民地官员、外交官，第二次鸦片战争期间的英方全权专使，下令焚毁圆明园。
description.en: A British colonial administrator and diplomat, who served as the British High Commissioner and Plenipotentiary during the Second Opium War and ordered the burning of the Yuanmingyuan.

description.zh-cn: 英国外交官，在第二次鸦片战争期间被清军俘虏并遭受虐待。
description.en: A British diplomat who was captured and tortured by Qing forces during the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京西北郊的清代皇家园林，在第二次鸦片战争中被英法联军抢掠并焚毁。
description.en: A complex of palaces and gardens in the suburbs of Beijing, which was looted and destroyed by Anglo-French forces during the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与英国、法国、俄国分别签订的结束第二次鸦片战争的不平等条约。
description.en: A series of unequal treaties signed between the Qing dynasty and Britain, France, and Russia, which ended the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 清朝在第二次鸦片战争期间与多国签订的不平等条约，后在北京条约中被承认。
description.en: A series of unequal treaties signed by the Qing dynasty with several foreign powers during the Second Opium War, later ratified in the Convention of Peking.

description.zh-cn: 咸丰帝的异母弟，在战争后期被任命为全权钦差大臣，负责与英法议和并签订《北京条约》。
description.en: The half-brother of the Xianfeng Emperor, appointed as Imperial Commissioner to negotiate with the British and French and sign the Convention of Peking.

description.zh-cn: 清朝晚期由部分官僚发起的旨在“师夷长技以制夷”的改革运动，第二次鸦片战争的失败是其直接诱因之一。
description.en: A reform movement in the late Qing dynasty initiated by some officials to 'learn from the barbarians to control the barbarians', partly triggered by the defeat in the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 清政府为办理对外交涉事务而设立的中央机构，是第二次鸦片战争的直接产物。
description.en: A central government body established by the Qing government to handle foreign affairs, a direct result of the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次鸦片战争期间，英法联军与清军在北京通州八里桥进行的一场决战，清军主力溃败。
description.en: A decisive battle during the Second Opium War between the Anglo-French forces and the Qing army at Palikao, near Beijing, resulting in the rout of the Qing main force.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次鸦片战争期间，通过外交手段和武力威胁，迫使清朝割让大片领土。
description.en: During the Second Opium War, it forced the Qing dynasty to cede large territories through diplomacy and military threats.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国与清朝签订的不平等条约，割让了黑龙江以北、外兴安岭以南约60万平方公里的领土。
description.en: An unequal treaty between the Russian Empire and the Qing dynasty, ceding about 600,000 square kilometers of territory north of the Amur River.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与俄国签订的条约，承认《瑷珲条约》并将乌苏里江以东约40万平方公里的土地划归俄国。
description.en: A treaty between the Qing dynasty and Russia which ratified the Treaty of Aigun and ceded about 400,000 square kilometers of territory east of the Ussuri River to Russia.

nodes.id: 尼古拉·帕夫洛维奇·伊格那提耶夫

zh-cn: 尼古拉·帕夫洛维奇·伊格那提耶夫

description.zh-cn: 俄国驻华公使，在第二次鸦片战争中以“调停有功”为由，迫使清政府签订《中俄北京条约》。
description.en: Russian Minister to China who, under the pretext of 'meritorious mediation' in the Second Opium War, coerced the Qing government into signing the Sino-Russian Convention of Peking.

description.zh-cn: 亚罗号事件的发生地，在战争初期被英法联军攻陷并占领。
description.en: The location of the Arrow Incident, captured and occupied by Anglo-French forces early in the war.

description.zh-cn: 清朝首都，在1860年被英法联军攻陷。
description.en: The capital of the Qing dynasty, captured by Anglo-French forces in 1860.

description.zh-cn: 亚罗号事件是英国发动第二次鸦片战争的直接导火索。
description.en: The Arrow Incident was the immediate trigger for Britain to launch the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 广西西林教案（马赖神父事件）是法国参与第二次鸦片战争的借口。
description.en: The Xilin religious case (Father Chapdelaine incident) was the pretext for France to participate in the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次鸦片战争中，大英帝国是清朝的敌对方。
description.en: The British Empire was an adversary of the Qing dynasty during the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次鸦片战争中，法兰西第二帝国是清朝的敌对方。
description.en: The Second French Empire was an adversary of the Qing dynasty during the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 英法联军攻占并占领广州城。
description.en: The Anglo-French forces captured and occupied the city of Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 英法联军攻占清朝首都北京。
description.en: The Anglo-French forces captured the Qing capital, Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 英法联军在抢掠圆明园后，对其进行了焚烧。
description.en: After looting the Yuanmingyuan, the Anglo-French forces set it on fire.

relationships.source: 詹姆斯·布鲁斯，第八代额尔金伯爵

description.zh-cn: 为报复清军虐待并杀害英法外交人员，额尔金下令英军焚烧圆明园。
description.en: In retaliation for the torture and murder of British and French envoys by Qing forces, Elgin ordered the British troops to burn the Yuanmingyuan.

description.zh-cn: 僧格林沁在通州谈判破裂后截获并监禁了以外交官巴夏礼为首的英法谈判团成员，其中多人被虐待致死。
description.en: After negotiations broke down in Tongzhou, Senggelinqin captured and imprisoned the Anglo-French delegation led by diplomat Harry Parkes, many of whom died from mistreatment.

description.zh-cn: 英法联军在攻占广州后俘虏了两广总督叶名琛，后将其押往印度加尔各答，叶名琛于次年绝食而死。
description.en: After capturing Guangzhou, the Anglo-French forces captured Viceroy Ye Mingchen and exiled him to Calcutta, India, where he died on a hunger strike the following year.

description.zh-cn: 英法联军攻入北京，咸丰帝逃往承德避暑山庄，并于次年病逝，战争的失败和打击是其重要死因。
description.en: As Anglo-French forces entered Beijing, the Xianfeng Emperor fled to the Chengde Mountain Resort and died the following year. The defeat and shock of the war were significant factors in his death.

description.zh-cn: 清朝在第二次鸦片战争中战败，被迫签订《北京条约》。
description.en: The Qing dynasty was defeated in the Second Opium War and forced to sign the Convention of Peking.

description.zh-cn: 《北京条约》迫使清朝承认《天津条约》有效、增开商埠、赔款、割让九龙半岛等。
description.en: The Convention of Peking forced the Qing dynasty to ratify the Treaty of Tientsin, open more treaty ports, pay indemnities, and cede the Kowloon Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 作为清政府的全权钦差大臣，代表清政府签订了中英、中法《北京条约》。
description.en: As the plenipotentiary Imperial Commissioner of the Qing government, he signed the Sino-British and Sino-French Conventions of Peking on behalf of the Qing.

description.zh-cn: 战争的惨败使清朝部分官员认识到与西方的差距，从而开启了旨在“师夷长技”的洋务运动。
description.en: The devastating defeat in the war made some Qing officials recognize the gap with the West, thus initiating the Self-Strengthening Movement aimed at 'learning from the barbarians'.

description.zh-cn: 为了处理战后与西方列强的外交事务，清政府于1861年设立了总理各国事务衙门。
description.en: To handle post-war diplomatic affairs with Western powers, the Qing government established the Zongli Yamen in 1861.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国趁清朝与英法联军交战之际，以武力胁迫清朝签订《瑷珲条约》，割让黑龙江以北大片领土。
description.en: While the Qing dynasty was at war with the Anglo-French forces, the Russian Empire used military force to compel the signing of the Treaty of Aigun, ceding large territories north of the Amur River.

relationships.source: 尼古拉·帕夫洛维奇·伊格那提耶夫

description.zh-cn: 伊格那提耶夫以“调停”英法与清朝冲突为名，对清政府施压，促成了《中俄北京条约》的签订。
description.en: Under the guise of 'mediating' the conflict between the Anglo-French and Qing forces, Ignatyev pressured the Qing government, leading to the signing of the Sino-Russian Convention of Peking.

description.zh-cn: 该条约迫使清朝承认《瑷珲条约》，并将乌苏里江以东约40万平方公里的领土割让给俄国。
description.en: This treaty forced the Qing dynasty to ratify the Treaty of Aigun and cede approximately 400,000 square kilometers of territory east of the Ussuri River to Russia.
